recipe_name: Spinach salad with bacon and walnuts
author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Place all the ingredients except the bacon into a bowl and stir well to coat the spinach leaves. To serve, top with the bacon.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz spinach,  50g/1¾oz walnuts, chopped,  ¼ onion, finely chopped,  2 tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  2 tsp red wine vinegar,  1 slice streaky bacon, grilled until crisp, to serve
